com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.promotion

Class VoucherInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.promotion.VoucherInfo

  • public class VoucherInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A POJO which provides information about an applied voucher (including its status and any applied discount).
    Since:
    5.6.200

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VoucherInfo(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String path, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, boolean isValid, java.lang.String message)
      Instantiate a new VoucherInfo.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.lang.String getDescription()
      An author-oriented description of the voucher.
      boolean getIsValid()
      Return if the voucher is currently valid.
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      A shopper-oriented message regarding the current status of the voucher.

      Get the path of the voucher if represented in the repository.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • VoucherInfo

        public VoucherInfo(java.lang.String code,
                   java.lang.String path,
                   java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   boolean isValid,
                   java.lang.String message)
        Instantiate a new VoucherInfo.
        Parameters:
        code - The voucher code which is typed in by the shopper.
        path - The path of the voucher if represented in the repository. Otherwise, an ID uniquely identifying the voucher.
        title - An author-oriented title.
        description - An author-oriented description of the voucher (and its current status).
        isValid - For a cart, whether or not the voucher is current valid. For a placed order, whether or not the voucher was valid when the order was placed.
        message - A shopper-oriented message.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path of the voucher if represented in the repository. Otherwise, an ID uniquely identifying the voucher to the external commerce engine.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        An author-oriented title.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        An author-oriented description of the voucher.

      • getCode

        public java.lang.String getCode()
        Get the voucher code. This is normally the string the shopper would type into the cart. NB: while generally unique within a given time-frame, voucher codes are often reused in non-overlapping time-frames. It is also possible to use a priority to disambiguate several vouchers sharing the same voucher code.

      • getIsValid

        public boolean getIsValid()
        Return if the voucher is currently valid. This is often used to enforce start and expiration dates, but actual semantics are implementation-dependent.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        A shopper-oriented message regarding the current status of the voucher.
